thread.title: Richard Roberge
thread.title_full: Extra Space Storage reviewed by Richard Roberge

author: Richard Roberge
title: Richard Roberge
text: The Extra Space Storage facility at 260 Railroad Ave. is a first-rate option for storage. The facility is always clean, secure and well-run. Joe Sanchez and his on-site manager, Ken, are consummate professionals who treat their customers with respect and care.
